1.2.0.name: wordpress/dexs-extended-notepad-widget
1.2.0.description:
Write, Edit, Save, Delete and Protect your Informations. Simple, Fast and Directly on your WordPress Dashboard with our Dexs Extended Notepad Widget!

Eine deutsche Beschreibung findest Du auf: http://www.sambrishes.net/wordpress/dexs-notepad

NOW with MultiSite (WP-MU) support!

If you activate the Plugin for the entire Network, you will get only one Database Table for all notes. And you can access to all notes on all Sites/Dashboards! And also you will get the Dasboard Widget on the Network Administration Dashboard!

If you activate the Plugin per page, you will receive per page a extra Database Table for your Notes!

Features

  • Write, Edit, Save, Delete and Protect your Notes.
  • Create unlimited notes!
  • Pin a note.
  • Set your own notes private, only for you, or public, for all!
  • Configure the Permissions/Access based on the W
